Continuing that progress is imperative, which is why I support the #EqualityAct, because no one should face discrimination because of who they love. #LoveisLove pic.twitter.com/tetne09KXd

As a new dad, I cannot imagine the pain and heartbreak of having your child taken from you or to learn they are being held in unsafe or unsanitary conditions.

We must work together on comprehensive reform that fixes this broken system.

Tonight I voted for emergengy funding legislation to address the dire situation at the border and mitigate the terrible, inhumane conditions created by the Trump Administration’s failed policy of mass detention and child separation.
